This heroic true story of the three youngest children of a bourgeois Catholic family who worked together in the French Resistance is told by an American writer who has known and admired the family for five decades

His sisters carried on the fight without him until the end of the war. His parents and oldest brother were arrested and shipped off on the last train from Paris to Germany before the liberation, and died in the camps.
